Html:
The Prism V2 download site links to the Silverlight 2 (not 3) SDK as a pre-req.   If I want to dev SL 3 apps, I assume I should install the SL 3  (not 2) SDK.

But does the Silverlight 3 SDK require the 2 SDK be installed first?

Thanks,

DT

Hi DT,

To develop Prism application for the Silverlight 3 Runtime you need to download the Silverlight 3 Tools from here. This does not require any previous versions.

Please let me know if this helps.
